script.name: sswiftDialog - Prompt to Self Service Item
script.notes:
This script uses swiftDialog to present information to an enduser. The popup will appear in the upper right corner of the users screen.
In this script we are using the FileVault icon as an example. - /System/Library/CoreServices/CoreTypes.bundle/Contents/Resources/FileVaultIcon.icns - other icons can be found here: https://gist.github.com/coolaj86/ea4d402a3d2ed34c7bc3e91655f21516 - you can also build a PKG to install local assets to /usr/local/newFolder
button1action - set to an action like running a Self Service policy (execute or view) - example: jamfselfservice://content?entity=policy&id=1&action=execute
message - change as needed
